synopsis.text: Mitsuha's life takes a dramatic turn when she loses her family in a tragic accident and fails her university entrance exams. Her petite stature and youthful appearance often cause others to mistake her for a middle school student, further compounding her struggles. Faced with mounting living expenses and the burden of maintaining her family home, Mitsuha's future seems bleak. However, everything changes when she discovers the power to traverse between her own world and a mystical alternate realm, granted to her by an enigmatic entity. With this newfound ability, Mitsuha embarks on a daring quest to amass a fortune of 80,000 gold coins in both worlds, enough to secure her financial independence and ensure a comfortable life. As she navigates the challenges and opportunities presented by her unique situation, Mitsuha must rely on her wits and determination to achieve her ambitious goal.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
